entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
